SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM board_review
WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{reviewTitle}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{reviewTitle}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
WHERE isbn LIKE '%'||#{isbn}||'%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, isbn,imagePath, writer,reviewTitle,content,viewCount,regdate FROM board_review
WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{reviewTitle}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{reviewTitle}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
WHERE isbn LIKE '%'||#{isbn}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (num, writer, isbn, imagePath, reviewTitle, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{isbn}, #{imagePath}, #{reviewTitle}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE)
